content: Hello I just installed zullip using a self-signed cert and it won't load in any browser regardless of running it with its DNS name or via IP . It keeps saying the cert is not valid but it never gives me the option to select the risk. This is a running on the latest version of ubuntu server. Any assistance would help since I have managed to bring it up in this same manner in the past.
@Adriana Gonzalez generally the best option is to just get a real certificate via certbot.
If that's difficult for some reason, there's a range of ways to override it that you find by googling, but none of them are ones I'd recommend.

I actually also tried installing one of my own but that also didn't work and because I was able to set it up before without
a valid cert, I figured I must be doing something else that is making it fail. Thanks.
